game

Class ScreenFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.ScreenFactory

  • public class ScreenFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    The ScreenFactory is a class that can create, and set a Screen to show.
    Version:
    1.0, May 22 2014., 1.1, May 28 2014. (Panda Company - changed Screen to LevelScreen), 1.2, June 4 2014. (Added win and loseFocus methods), 1.3, June 8 2014. (JavaDoc, removed setCurrentScreen), 1.4, June 8 2014. (Added getGame.)
    Author:
    baseball435, Anqi Wu (setCurrentScreen, win, loseFocus, JavaDoc)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private GameWindow game
      game - GameWindow - The GameWindow of the ScreenFactory.
      private LevelScreen screen
      screen - LevelScreen - The current LevelScreen of the ScreenFactory.

      Constructor and Description

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LevelScreen getCurrentScreen()
      Returns the current LevelScreen.
      GameWindow getGame()
      Returns the current gameWindow.
      void loseFocus()
      Calls loseFocus in the GameWindow.
      void showScreen(LevelScreen screen)
      Sets the currentScreen to the one in the parameter and creates it.
